posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Sorry but I keep finding new and interesting information.  I am wondering if it would be possible to build a pure fighter.  Here are your bonuses.  
Let me know what you think

Legionnaire (Legionario). Requirements: 80 fighter levels, Called shot, Improved knockdown. Benefits: bonus of 10% physical damage immunity on the object of the CDV Supreme fighter, bonus of +10 physical damage reduction on the protection rod, acquires an object that provides an attack bonus of +25 usable three times a day. The benefits of the Legionnaire will be deactivated if any classes other than the fighter one are chosen.

Praetorian Guard (Guardia pretoriana). Requirements: 120 fighter levels, Improved Expertise, Improved Whirlwind Attack. Benefits: epic dodge, poison weapon, 50% concealment.

David

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
David, it is extremely easy to build a pure fighter that passes all these requirements since you have ten tons of feats to work with.
Just make sure you have 13+ intelligence & 13+ dexterity so that you can take them while you level your character.
Check the Yardstick Builds thread for ideas & sample builds, there are plenty of fighters in there.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Start with these attributes & go from there: Dwarf, Str:16(32) Dex:14 Con:21(22) Int:14 Wis:6 Cha:6
They are already adjusted for the nano-Roccia sub-race. The stats in parenthesis are what you should have in the first forty-levels, after that, everything is going to strength.
Don't forget to tale luck of heroes & iron will pre-epic to compensate for the low wisdom somewhat since you are forbidden to take CoT levels, although in such high-magic PWs immunities are running rampant. 
If you want to fortify your saving-throws even more, leave Con:21 & get epic will too.
And that's it, you have so many feats that you can take everything you want & you qualify for all of them due to your ability scores, Dex:14 & Int:14.
Knockdown, Improved Knockdown, Dodge, Mobility, Spring Attack, Whirlwind Attack, Called-Shot, Expertise & Improve Expertise, are your requirements.
